# mirascope.core.openai.dynamic_config

<ApiType type="Module" />

This module defines the function return type for functions as LLM calls.

## Module Attributes

| Name | Type | Description |
| ---- | ---- | ----------- |
| AsyncOpenAIDynamicConfig | None |  |
| OpenAIDynamicConfig | None | The function return type for functions wrapped with the `openai_call` decorator.

Example:

```python
from mirascope.core import prompt_template
from mirascope.core.openai import OpenAIDynamicConfig, openai_call


@openai_call("gpt-4o-mini")
@prompt_template("Recommend a {capitalized_genre} book")
def recommend_book(genre: str) -> OpenAIDynamicConfig:
    return {"computed_fields": {"capitalized_genre": genre.capitalize()}}
``` |
